Questions.Text: Who was the first president of the United States?
In what year was the Declaration of Independence signed?
Which amendment to the U.S. Constitution abolished slavery?
Who was the first woman to serve on the Supreme Court?
Which war was fought between the Union and the Confederacy?

What was the name of the space program that landed the first humans on the moon?

What was the name of the first successful American transcontinental railroad?
